title: S7E05 – "Tones of Terror" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Micah Edwards, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, all of  them centered around some quite malevolent reading material.   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
